name: Whoseturnisit
0:
”Alexa, open who's turn is it?”
”Alexa, ask who's turn is it to pick between Sarah or Nathan”
”Alexa, ask who's turn is it to change the saved names”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: who's turn is it
des:
Arguing over whose turn it is to mow the lawn, buy the coffee round or do the dishes? Provide 2 or more names to Alexa and let her help by picking whose turn it is! Never argue over who needs to do a chore again!

Great for deciding who needs to make the tea, which child is doing the washing up or who in the team is buying the coffees today! You can even save all the names to make it faster with no limits on how many people can be added!

Simply say "Alexa, whose turn is it" and she'll walk you through the process of picking between 2 or more people and saving the names for regular requests!

For one-off queries you can say "Alexa, ask whose turn is it to pick between Sarah or Nathan" to get an immediate decision.
